means: 容忍( abide的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I went round the streets and found his new abode.
sentence.Network_cn: 我走街串巷找到了他的新住所。

sentence.Network_en: He's of no fixed abode and we found him on the streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 他居无定所，我们发现他流落街头。

sentence.Network_en: The child abode with his grandparents for two years.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个孩子和祖父母一起居住了两年.

list.abs: The next day her trunks left for the new abode ., 第二天 , 她的箱子就搬到了新居.
媒心媒肺媒出息 - 博客大巴 ... Glasses 眼镜 Humble Abode 蜗居 Inspired 有灵感的.
is a abode , a tree and a dog ., 有一幢屋子 , 一棵树和一只狗.
They established their permanent abode here ., 他们在此建立了永久居所.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (in the sense 'act of waiting'): verbal noun from abide

entry.def: Your abode is the place where you live.

example.ex: I went round the streets and found his new abode.
example.tran: 我走街串巷找到了他的新住所。

entry.def: If someone has no fixed abode, they are homeless.

example.ex: 30 per cent of psychiatric hospital beds are occupied by people of no fixed abode.
example.tran: 精神病院30%的床位是被无家可归者占据的。

entry.def: If someone is given the right of abode in a particular country, they are legally allowed to live there.

example.ex: Outsiders who wed islanders are given only three years' right of abode at first.
example.tran: 岛外的人和岛民结婚之初只能获得三年的居住权。

means.word_mean: 1. any address at which you dwell more than temporarily;
2. housing that someone is living in;

sentences.sentence: "he built a modest dwelling near the pond"
"they raise money to provide homes for the homeless"

auth_sentence.content: Your patience for my long abode.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your patience for my long abode.

auth_sentence.content: No one bothered to mention that their policy didn't cover flooding for my ground-floor abode.
auth_sentence.res_content: No one bothered to mention that their policy didn't cover flooding for my ground-floor abode.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No one bothered to mention that their policy didn't cover flooding for my ground-floor abode.

auth_sentence.content: Rest assure our generation for millions of years to come will rest in peace very nicely on this abode of ours.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rest assure our generation for millions of years to come will rest in peace very nicely on this abode of ours.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rest assure our generation for millions of years to come will rest in peace very nicely on this abode of ours.

sentences.en: They still dwelt in their old abode.
sentences.cn: 他们仍然怀念过去的住所。

sentences.en: Let me take you to my humble abode!
sentences.cn: 让我带你们到鄙人的寒舍去吧!

jushi.english: The woodcutter's abode was a house in the forest.
jushi.chinese: 樵夫住在森林中的一所房子里。

jushi.english: The forest was a fit abode for monkeys.
The merchant had his abode here.
